title.text: RFC 8299: YANG Data Model for L3VPN Service Delivery

contents.text:
Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF)                        Q. Wu, Ed.
Request for Comments: 8299                                        Huawei
Obsoletes: 8049                                             S. Litkowski
Category: Standards Track                                         Orange
ISSN: 2070-1721                                              L. Tomotaki
                                                                 Verizon
                                                                K. Ogaki
                                                        KDDI Corporation
                                                            January 2018
YANG Data Model for L3VPN Service Delivery
contents.zh-CHS: L3VPN服务交付的YANG数据模型

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This document defines a YANG data model that can be used for communication between customers and network operators and to deliver a Layer 3 provider-provisioned VPN service. This document is limited to BGP PE-based VPNs as described in RFCs 4026, 4110, and 4364. This model is intended to be instantiated at the management system to deliver the overall service. It is not a configuration model to be used directly on network elements. This model provides an abstracted view of the Layer 3 IP VPN service configuration components. It will be up to the management system to take this model as input and use specific configuration models to configure the different network elements to deliver the service. How the configuration of network elements is done is out of scope for this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档定义了一个数据模型，可用于客户和网络运营商之间的通信，并提供第3层提供商提供的VPN服务。本文档仅限于RFCs 4026、4110和4364中所述的基于BGP PE的VPN。该模型旨在在管理系统上实例化，以提供整体服务。它不是直接用于网络元素的配置模型。该模型提供了第3层IP VPN服务配置组件的抽象视图。由管理系统将此模型作为输入，并使用特定的配置模型来配置不同的网络元素以提供服务。如何配置网络元素超出了本文档的范围。

contents.text: This document obsoletes RFC 8049; it replaces the unimplementable module in that RFC with a new module with the same name that is not backward compatible. The changes are a series of small fixes to the YANG module and some clarifications to the text.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件淘汰了RFC 8049；它将RFC中不可实现的模块替换为具有相同名称且不向后兼容的新模块。这些变化是对YANG模块的一系列小修改和对文本的一些澄清。

contents.text: Table of Contents
contents.zh-CHS: 目录

contents.text: 1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: This document defines a Layer 3 VPN service data model written in YANG. The model defines service configuration elements that can be used in communication protocols between customers and network operators. Those elements can also be used as input to automated control and configuration applications.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档定义了一个用YANG编写的第3层VPN服务数据模型。该模型定义了可用于客户和网络运营商之间通信协议的服务配置元素。这些元素也可以用作自动控制和配置应用程序的输入。

contents.text: This document obsoletes [RFC8049]; it creates a new module with the same name as the module defined in [RFC8049]. The changes from [RFC8049] are listed in full in Section 1.4. They are small in scope, but include fixes to the module to make it possible to implement.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件淘汰[RFC8049]；它创建了一个与[RFC8049]中定义的模块同名的新模块。第1.4节详细列出了[RFC8049]的变更。它们的范围很小，但包括对模块的修复，使其能够实现。

contents.text: The YANG module described in [RFC8049] cannot be implemented because of issues around the use of XPATH. These issues are explained in Section 1.4.1.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC8049]中描述的YANG模块无法实现，因为XPATH的使用存在问题。第1.4.1节解释了这些问题。

contents.text: Section 11 of [RFC7950] describes when it is permissible to reuse a module name. Section 1.4.2 provides an impact assessment in this context.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC7950]第11节描述了何时允许重用模块名。第1.4.2节提供了这方面的影响评估。

contents.text: 1.1. Terminology
The following terms are defined in [RFC6241] and are not redefined here:
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC6241]中定义了以下术语，此处未重新定义：

contents.text: o client
contents.zh-CHS: o 客户

contents.text: o configuration data
contents.zh-CHS: o 配置数据

contents.text: o server
contents.zh-CHS: o 服务器

contents.text: o state data
contents.zh-CHS: o 状态数据

contents.text: The following terms are defined in [RFC7950] and are not redefined here:
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC7950]中定义了以下术语，此处未重新定义：

contents.text: o augment
contents.zh-CHS: o 加强

contents.text: o data model
contents.zh-CHS: o 数据模型

contents.text: o data node
contents.zh-CHS: o 数据节点

contents.text: The terminology for describing YANG data models is found in [RFC7950].
contents.zh-CHS: 描述YANG数据模型的术语见[RFC7950]。

contents.text: This document presents some configuration examples using XML representation.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档介绍了一些使用XML表示的配置示例。

contents.text: 1.2. Requirements Language
contents.zh-CHS: 1.2. 需求语言

contents.text: The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "NOT RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in BCP 14 [RFC2119] [RFC8174] when, and only when, they appear in all capitals, as shown here.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件中的关键词“必须”、“不得”、“必需”、“应”、“不应”、“建议”、“不建议”、“可”和“可选”在所有大写字母出现时（如图所示）应按照BCP 14[RFC2119][RFC8174]所述进行解释。

contents.text: 1.3. Tree Diagrams
contents.zh-CHS: 1.3. 树形图

contents.text: A simplified graphical representation of the data model is presented in Section 6.
contents.zh-CHS: 第6节给出了数据模型的简化图形表示。

contents.text: The meanings of the symbols in these diagrams are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 这些图表中的符号含义如下：

contents.text: o Brackets "[" and "]" enclose list keys.
contents.zh-CHS: o 括号“[”和“]”包含列表键。

contents.text: o Curly braces "{" and "}" contain names of optional features that make the corresponding node conditional.
contents.zh-CHS: o 大括号“{”和“}”包含使相应节点具有条件的可选功能的名称。

contents.text: o Abbreviations before data node names: "rw" means configuration data (read-write), and "ro" means state data (read-only).
contents.zh-CHS: o 数据节点名称前的缩写：“rw”表示配置数据（读写），“ro”表示状态数据（只读）。

contents.text: o Symbols after data node names: "?" means an optional node, and "*" denotes a "list" or "leaf-list".
contents.zh-CHS: o 数据节点名称后的符号：“？”表示可选节点，“*”表示“列表”或“叶列表”。

contents.text: o Parentheses enclose choice and case nodes, and case nodes are also marked with a colon (":").
contents.zh-CHS: o 括号括住选项和事例节点，事例节点也用冒号（“：”）标记。

contents.text: o Ellipsis ("...") stands for contents of subtrees that are not shown.
contents.zh-CHS: o 省略号（“…”）表示未显示的子树的内容。

contents.text: 1.4. Summary of Changes from RFC 8049
contents.zh-CHS: 1.4. RFC 8049变更汇总表

contents.text: This document revises and obsoletes L3VPN Service Model [RFC8049], drawing on insights gained from L3VPN Service Model deployments and on feedback from the community. The major changes are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档利用从L3VPN服务模型部署中获得的见解和社区反馈，修订并废除L3VPN服务模型[RFC8049]。主要变化如下：

contents.text: o Change type from 16-bit integer to string for the leaf id under "qos-classification-policy" container.
contents.zh-CHS: o 将“qos分类策略”容器下叶id的类型从16位整数更改为字符串。

contents.text: o Stick to using ordered-by user and remove inefficiency to map service model sequence number to device model sequence number.
contents.zh-CHS: o 坚持使用“按用户订购”并消除将服务型号序列号映射到设备型号序列号的低效性。

contents.text: o Remove mandating the use of deviations and add "if-feature target-sites" under the leaf-list target-sites in Section 6.12.2.1 of [RFC8049].
contents.zh-CHS: o 删除对偏差使用的强制要求，并在[RFC8049]第6.12.2.1节的叶列表目标站点下添加“如果特征目标站点”。

contents.text: o Change in keywords from [RFC2119] and [RFC8174] on operation of the management system in the third paragraph of Section 6.6, Section 6.6.5, and Section 7.
contents.zh-CHS: o 第6.6节、第6.6.5节和第7节第三段中关于管理系统运行的[RFC2119]和[RFC8174]关键字的更改。

contents.text: o Fix incomplete description statements.
contents.zh-CHS: o 修复不完整的描述语句。

contents.text: o Add YANG statement to check that Stateless Address Autoconfiguration (SLAAC) parameters are used only for IPv6.
contents.zh-CHS: o Add语句检查无状态地址自动配置（SLAAC）参数是否仅用于IPv6。

contents.text: o Fix strange wording in Section 6.11.7.
contents.zh-CHS: o 修正第6.11.7节中的奇怪措辞。

contents.text: o Change the use of the absolute paths to the use of relative paths in the "must" statement or "path" statement for vpn-policy-id leaf node, management container, location leaf node, devices container, location case, location-reference leaf, device case, device-reference leaf to make configuration is only applicable to the current sites.
contents.zh-CHS: o 将绝对路径的使用更改为vpn策略id叶节点、管理容器、位置叶节点、设备容器、位置案例、位置引用叶、设备案例、设备引用叶的“必须”语句或“路径”语句中的相对路径的使用，以使配置仅适用于当前站点。

contents.text: o Change "must" statement to "when" statement for management container device container.
contents.zh-CHS: o 将管理容器设备容器的“必须”语句更改为“何时”语句。

contents.text: o Fix optional parameter issues by adding a default or description for others or make some of them mandatory.
contents.zh-CHS: o 通过为其他参数添加默认值或说明或将其中一些参数设置为必填项，修复可选参数问题。

contents.text: o Define new grouping vpn-profile-cfg for all the identifiers provided by SP to the customer. The identifiers include cloud-identifier, std-qos-profile, OAM profile-name, and provider-profile for encryption.
contents.zh-CHS: o 为SP提供给客户的所有标识符定义新的分组vpn配置文件cfg。标识符包括云标识符、std qos配置文件、OAM配置文件名称和加密的提供商配置文件。

contents.text: o Add in the XPATH string representation of identityrefs and remove unqualified name. Change from YANG 1.0 Support to YANG 1.1 Support.
contents.zh-CHS: o 添加identityrefs的XPATH字符串表示形式并删除非限定名称。从YANG 1.0支持更改为YANG 1.1支持。

contents.text: o Remove "when" statement from leaf nat44-customer-address.
contents.zh-CHS: o 从客户地址中删除“when”语句。

contents.text: o Fixed broken example and Add mandatory element in the examples.
contents.zh-CHS: o 修复了损坏的示例，并在示例中添加了强制元素。

contents.text: o Remove redundant parameters in the cloud access.
contents.zh-CHS: o 删除云访问中的冗余参数。

contents.text: o Specify provider address and a list of start-end addresses from provider address for DHCP case.
contents.zh-CHS: o 从DHCP案例的提供程序地址中指定提供程序地址和开始-结束地址列表。

contents.text: o Add a few text to clarify what the site is in Section 6.3.
contents.zh-CHS: o 在第6.3节中添加一些文字，以澄清网站的内容。

contents.text: o Add multi-filter and multiVPN per entry support for VPN policy.
contents.zh-CHS: o 为VPN策略添加多筛选器和每个条目多VPN支持。

contents.text: o Modify description for svc-input-bandwidth leaf and svc-output-bandwidth leaf to make it consistent with the text in Section 6.12.1.
contents.zh-CHS: o 修改svc输入带宽叶和svc输出带宽叶的说明，使其与第6.12.1节中的文本一致。

contents.text: o Clarify the rational of the model in the Section 5.
contents.zh-CHS: o 在第5节中阐明模型的合理性。

contents.text: o Add text to clarify the way to achieve Per-VPN QoS policy.
contents.zh-CHS: o 添加文本以阐明实现每VPN QoS策略的方法。

contents.text: 1.4.1. Implementation Issues with RFC 8049
contents.zh-CHS: 1.4.1. RFC 8049的实施问题

contents.text: [RFC8049] made an initial attempt to define a YANG data model forL3VPN services. After it was published it was discovered that, while the YANG compiled it was broken from an implementation perspective. That is, it was impossible to build a functional implementation of the module.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC8049]初步尝试为L3VPN服务定义一个数据模型。在它发布后，人们发现，尽管杨编译了它，但从实现的角度来看，它被破坏了。也就是说，不可能构建模块的功能实现。

contents.text: Section 1.4 provides a full list of the changes since [RFC8049]. Some of these changes remove ambiguities from the documented YANG, while other changes fix the implementation issues.
contents.zh-CHS: 第1.4节提供了自[RFC8049]以来变更的完整列表。其中一些更改消除了文档中的歧义，而其他更改修复了实现问题。

contents.text: 1. Several uses of 'must' expressions in the module were broken badly enough that the module was not usable in the form it was published. While some compilers and YANG checkers found no issues (most YANG tools do not attempt to parse these expressions), other tools that really understand the XPATH in the expressions refused to compile them.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. “必须”表达式在模块中的多次使用被严重破坏，导致模块无法以发布时的形式使用。虽然一些编译器和YANG Checker没有发现任何问题（大多数YANG工具不尝试解析这些表达式），但其他真正理解表达式中XPATH的工具拒绝编译它们。

contents.text: The changes needed to fix these expressions were small and local.
contents.zh-CHS: 修复这些表达式所需的更改很小而且是局部的。

contents.text: 2. The second issue relates to how Access Control List (ACL) rules were sorted. In [RFC8049] the English language text and the text in the YANG definition contradicted each other. Furthermore, the model used classic ACL rule numbering notation for something that was semantically very different (ordered-by user) in the YANG thus creating the potential for misunderstanding.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 第二个问题涉及如何对访问控制列表（ACL）规则进行排序。在[RFC8049]中，英语文本和杨定义中的文本相互矛盾。此外，该模型使用了经典的ACL规则编号符号来表示YANG中语义非常不同（由用户排序）的内容，因此可能会产生误解。

contents.text: 3. Further to point 2, the ACL modeling in [RFC8049] was incompatible with work going on in other IETF documents such as [ACL-YANG].
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 除第2点外，[RFC8049]中的ACL建模与其他IETF文档（如[ACL-YANG]）中正在进行的工作不兼容。

contents.text: 1.4.2. Impact Assessment
contents.zh-CHS: 1.4.2. 影响评估

contents.text: When changing the content of a YANG module, care must be taken to ensure that there are no interoperability issues caused by a failure to enable backward compatibility.
contents.zh-CHS: 在更改模块的内容时，必须注意确保不存在由于未能启用向后兼容性而导致的互操作性问题。

contents.text: Section 11 of [RFC7950] clearly describes the circumstances under which it is not acceptable to maintain a module name.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC7950]第11节明确描述了不允许维护模块名称的情况。

contents.text: ...changes to published modules are not allowed if they have any potential to cause interoperability problems between a client using an original specification and a server using an updated specification.
contents.zh-CHS: …如果对已发布模块的更改可能导致使用原始规范的客户端和使用更新规范的服务器之间的互操作性问题，则不允许对这些模块进行更改。

contents.text: The module defined in this document is not backward compatible with that defined in [RFC8049], but it is important to understand that there is no possibility of an interoperability issue between the module defined in this document and that presented in [RFC8049] because that module could not be implemented for the reasons described in Section 1.4.1. Thus, noting the rules set out in [RFC7950], it was decided to retain the module name in this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件中定义的模块与[RFC8049]中定义的模块不向后兼容，但重要的是要理解，本文件中定义的模块与[RFC8049]中介绍的模块之间不存在互操作性问题由于第1.4.1节所述原因，该模块无法实现。因此，注意到[RFC7950]中规定的规则，决定在本文件中保留模块名称。

contents.text: SLAAC: Stateless Address Autoconfiguration.
contents.zh-CHS: SLAAC：无状态地址自动配置。

contents.text: SP: Service Provider.
contents.zh-CHS: SP：服务提供商。

contents.text: SPT: Shortest Path Tree.
contents.zh-CHS: 最短路径树。

contents.text: SSM: Source-Specific Multicast.
contents.zh-CHS: SSM：特定于源的多播。

contents.text: VM: Virtual Machine.
contents.zh-CHS: 虚拟机：虚拟机。

contents.text: VPN: Virtual Private Network.
contents.zh-CHS: VPN：虚拟专用网络。

contents.text: VRF: VPN Routing and Forwarding.
contents.zh-CHS: VRF:VPN路由和转发。

contents.text: VRRP: Virtual Router Redundancy Protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: 虚拟路由器冗余协议。

contents.text: 3. Definitions
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 定义

contents.text: Customer Edge (CE) Device: A CE is equipment dedicated to a particular customer; it is directly connected (at Layer 3) to one or more PE devices via attachment circuits. A CE is usually located at the customer premises and is usually dedicated to a single VPN, although it may support multiple VPNs if each one has separate attachment circuits.
contents.zh-CHS: 客户边缘（CE）设备：CE是专用于特定客户的设备；它通过连接电路直接连接（在第3层）到一个或多个PE设备。CE通常位于客户场所，通常专用于单个VPN，但如果每个VPN都有单独的连接电路，则可能支持多个VPN。

contents.text: Provider Edge (PE) Device: A PE is equipment managed by the SP; it can support multiple VPNs for different customers and is directly connected (at Layer 3) to one or more CE devices via attachment circuits. A PE is usually located at an SP point of presence (POP) and is managed by the SP.
contents.zh-CHS: 提供商边缘（PE）设备：PE是SP管理的设备；它可以为不同的客户支持多个VPN，并通过连接电路直接连接（在第3层）到一个或多个CE设备。PE通常位于SP存在点（POP），由SP管理。

contents.text: PE-Based VPNs: The PE devices know that certain traffic is VPN traffic. They forward the traffic (through tunnels) based on the destination IP address of the packet and, optionally, based on other information in the IP header of the packet. The PE devices are themselves the tunnel endpoints. The tunnels may make use of various encapsulations to send traffic over the SP network (such as, but not restricted to, GRE, IP-in-IP, IPsec, or MPLS tunnels).
contents.zh-CHS: 基于PE的VPN：PE设备知道某些流量是VPN流量。它们根据数据包的目的地IP地址和数据包的IP报头中的其他信息（可选）转发流量（通过隧道）。PE设备本身就是隧道端点。隧道可利用各种封装在SP网络上发送通信量（例如但不限于GRE、IP中的IP、IPsec或MPLS隧道）。

contents.text: 4. Layer 3 IP VPN Service Model
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 第三层IP VPN服务模型

contents.text: A Layer 3 IP VPN service is a collection of sites that are authorized to exchange traffic between each other over a shared IP infrastructure. This Layer 3 VPN service model aims at providing a common understanding of how the corresponding IP VPN service is to be deployed over the shared infrastructure. This service model is limited to BGP PE-based VPNs as described in [RFC4026], [RFC4110], and [RFC4364].
contents.zh-CHS: 第3层IP VPN服务是授权通过共享IP基础设施在彼此之间交换流量的站点集合。此第3层VPN服务模型旨在提供有关如何在共享基础设施上部署相应IP VPN服务的共识。此服务模型仅限于[RFC4026]、[RFC4110]和[RFC4364]中所述的基于BGP PE的VPN。

contents.text: 5. Service Data Model Usage
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 服务数据模型使用

contents.text: Site A Site B
contents.zh-CHS: 场地A场地B

contents.text: The idea of the L3 IP VPN service model is to propose an abstracted interface between customers and network operators to manage configuration of components of an L3VPN service. The model is intended to be used in a mode where the network operator's system is the server and the customer's system is the client. A typical scenario would be to use this model as an input for an orchestration layer that will be responsible for translating it to an orchestrated configuration of network elements that will be part of the service. The network elements can be routers but can also be servers (like AAA); the network's configuration is not limited to these examples. The configuration of network elements can be done via the CLI, NETCONF/RESTCONF [RFC6241] [RFC8040] coupled with YANG data models of a specific configuration (BGP, VRF, BFD, etc.), or some other technique, as preferred by the operator.
contents.zh-CHS: L3 IP VPN服务模型的思想是在客户和网络运营商之间提出一个抽象接口，以管理L3VPN服务组件的配置。该模型旨在用于网络运营商系统为服务器，客户系统为客户端的模式。典型的场景是使用此模型作为编排层的输入，编排层负责将其转换为作为服务一部分的网络元素的编排配置。网络元件可以是路由器，也可以是服务器（如AAA）；网络的配置不限于这些示例。网元的配置可以通过CLI、NETCONF/RESTCONF[RFC6241][RFC8040]以及特定配置的数据模型（BGP、VRF、BFD等）或操作员首选的其他技术完成。

contents.text: The usage of this service model is not limited to this example; it can be used by any component of the management system but not directly by network elements.
contents.zh-CHS: 此服务模型的使用不限于此示例；它可以由管理系统的任何组件使用，但不能直接由网络元素使用。

contents.text: 6. Design of the Data Model
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 数据模型的设计

contents.text: The YANG module is divided into two main containers: "vpn-services" and "sites".
contents.zh-CHS: YANG模块分为两个主要容器：“vpn服务”和“站点”。

contents.text: The "vpn-service" list under the vpn-services container defines global parameters for the VPN service for a specific customer.
contents.zh-CHS: vpn服务容器下的“vpn服务”列表定义特定客户的vpn服务的全局参数。

contents.text: A "site" is composed of at least one "site-network-access" and, in the case of multihoming, may have multiple site-network-access points. The site-network-access attachment is done through a "bearer" with an "ip-connection" on top. The bearer refers to properties of the attachment that are below Layer 3, while the connection refers to properties oriented to the Layer 3 protocol. The bearer may be allocated dynamically by the SP, and the customer may provide some constraints or parameters to drive the placement of the access.
contents.zh-CHS: “站点”由至少一个“站点网络接入”组成，并且在多主的情况下，可以具有多个站点网络接入点。站点网络访问连接通过顶部带有“ip连接”的“承载器”完成。承载指的是第3层之下的附件属性，而连接指的是面向第3层协议的属性。承载可以由SP动态地分配，并且客户可以提供一些约束或参数来驱动接入的放置。

contents.text: Authorization of traffic exchange is done through what we call a VPN policy or VPN service topology defining routing exchange rules between sites.
contents.zh-CHS: 流量交换的授权是通过定义站点间路由交换规则的VPN策略或VPN服务拓扑来完成的。

contents.text: The figure below describes the overall structure of the YANG module:
contents.zh-CHS: 下图描述了YANG模块的整体结构：
